attributes.action: create a box on all election ballot papers to allow a vote for "NON OF THE ABOVE"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
by creating a box on all election ballot papers allowing a vote for "non of the above" would allow a true voice of the people to be shown.
giving all parties the opportunity to re address the parts of their manifesto that the true majority of the country disagree with rather than as is at the moment where the people of the country HAVE to vote for the best of a bad bunch(so not to "WASTE"their vote) or not vote at all. if the majority vote should end up to be "none of the above" there should be an interim period of an equal hung parliament for an agreed period of time to enable all parties to change their policies to reflect the voice of a true majority.
